CodeList.Name: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument test name.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Able to Sense Feet When Walking
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Able to Sense Feet When Walking
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Are you able to sense your feet when you walk?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MNSI - Able to Sense Feet When Walking

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Able to Tell Hot from Cold Water
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Able to Tell Hot from Cold Water
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: When you get into the tub or shower, are you able to tell the hot water from the cold water?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MNSI - Able to Tell Hot from Cold Water

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Are Feet Too Sensitive to Touch
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Are Feet Too Sensitive to Touch

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Are Your Legs and/or Feet Numb
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Are Your Legs and/or Feet Numb
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Are your legs and/or feet numb?
Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Has your doctor ever told you that you have diabetic neuropathy?
Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Have you ever had an amputation?

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Ever Had Open Sore on Foot
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Ever Had Open Sore on Foot
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Have you ever had an open sore on your foot?
Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Do you ever have any burning pain in your legs and/or feet?
Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Do you ever have any prickling feelings in your legs or feet?

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: MNSI1-Feel Weak All Over Most Times
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MNSI1-Feel Weak All Over Most Times
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Do you feel weak all over most of the time?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MNSI - Feel Weak All Over Most Times

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Do you get muscle cramps in your legs and/or feet?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument - History: Does it hurt when the bed covers touch your skin?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MNSI - Hurt When Bed Covers Touch Skin
